Articles.Content: I'm trying to get back into the game now that it has had a full release. I've just downloaded all of the required and recommended mods for Realism Overhaul as well as some parts packs (KW, NP, Ect.) I've got one problem though. The game will load up and let me into the space center, however, it will not allow me to enter the VAB or SPH. Is there a fix for this?
Please see the "How to get support" sticky thread in this sub-forum for details of what information we will need (and what you may be able to do yourself) to diagnose your problem.
